TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IClientFormatterSinkProvider implements class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSinkProvider

summary.span: 將用戶端通道接收提供者 (Provider) 標記為用戶端格式子 (Formatter) 接收提供者。

span.span: Marks a client channel sink provider as a client formatter sink provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A建立用戶端格式器接收遠端訊息流程的用戶端通道。A creates client formatter sinks for the client channel through which remoting messages flow. 用戶端上的第一個接收必須同時實作和介面，或介面。The first sink on the client side must implement both the and interfaces, or the interface. 若要使用``標記而不是``標記在組態檔中，用戶端通道接收提供者必須實作介面，而不是只。To use a `` tag instead of a `` tag within a configuration file, the client channel sink provider must implement the interface instead of merely . 如需有關遠端組態的詳細資訊，請參閱[ [ \] ](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/226ecf74-ebbd-4ea0-a701-dcf4441deefe)和[遠端設定結構描述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dc2d1e62-9af7-4ca1-99fd-98b93bb4db9e).For additional information about remoting configuration, see [[\]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/226ecf74-ebbd-4ea0-a701-dcf4441deefe) and [Remoting Settings Schema](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dc2d1e62-9af7-4ca1-99fd-98b93bb4db9e). 某些格式器接收實作使用執行時期格式器 (和)。Some formatter sink implementations use run-time formatters ( and ). 其他實作可以使用它們自己的方法將通道訊息轉換為資料流。Other implementations can use their own means to transform the channel message into the stream. 傳回之旅格式器接收會將轉換的訊息資料流回通道訊息項目 （傳回訊息）。On the return journey the formatter sink will transform the message stream back into the channel message elements (return message).
